Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Riu Palmeras in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Kasbah Shopping Center and close to Yumbo Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Maspalomas Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 231 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and ceiling fans.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a health club and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities include wireless Internet access (surcharge), an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Riu Palmeras in San Bartolome de Tirajana (Playa del Ingles), you'll be minutes from Kasbah Shopping Center and close to Yumbo Shopping Center. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of CITA Shopping Center and Maspalomas Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kasbah Shopping Center - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Yumbo Shopping Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
CITA Shopping Center - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Maspalomas Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Las Burras Beach - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Playa de San Agustin - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Holiday World Maspalomas - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Maspalomas Golf Course - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Maspalomas Dunes - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Maspalomas Lighthouse - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Meloneras Beach - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Aqualand Maspalomas - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
El Aguila Beach - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Palmitos Park - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Puerto Rico Marina - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Riu Palmeras is Las Palmas (LPA-Gran Canaria) - 26.8 km / 16.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
